text: Rero umwe wese twaramuhanye kubera ibicumuro vyiwe, hakaba muribo abo twashikirije igihuhusi c’umusenyi, n’abandi muribo basokowe imitima yabo kw’ijwi rininiya cane, n’abandi muribo twabatsindagiye mukuzimu, n’abandi muribo twabibije mumazi, rero ntiyari kuba Imana yoba hemukiye mugabo nibo bahemukiye imitima yabo
